body:
### Welcome to my web site

My name is Dan Lipert and I'm a iOS, web, and Django developer living in beautiful Portland, OR. I own [The Ministry of Apps](http://tmoa.us), where we work with clients to help them conceptualize, develop, and market their startups and apps.

### My projects

I'm hoping to add more and more of my work here, but for now you can check out my iPad template for a [split view with two navigation controllers](https://github.com/danlipert/Double-Navigation-Split-View).  It's a great starting point for any iPad app with lots of drill downs and different types of detail views.

### My favorite libraries

I love github and my company could not succeed without the amazing contributions by talented developers worldwide.

* [Django](https://github.com/django/django) - An amazing web framework that we use to create our APIs
* [ASIHTTPRequest](https://github.com/django/django) - Networking on iOS made easy
* [Bootstrap](https://github.com/twitter/bootstrap/) - Even I can create a pleasant interface :)
name: Dan Lipert
tagline: Owner of The Ministry of Apps, mobile and server side development
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
